title: Puzzled by Pink
description: Not every girl loves pink  Izzy hates pink as much as her sister, Rose, loves it. So when Rose plans an all-pink birthday party with the guests dressed in fairy costumes, Izzy decides to give her own alternative party in the attic, where the guests will be monsters, spiders, ghosts, and the pet cat. But some powerful magic triggers the appearance of yet another guest -- an unexpected one. This will be a party nobody forgets!
author: Sarah Frances Hardy
